ModMetaData.name: Namekians
ModMetaData.author: Meng De
ModMetaData.description:
The Namekians from DBZ.
Features: - They only drink water (and other liquids, and liquor, and "processed") - Water can be drawn from the Well (custom building) - Friendly Namek factions - 2 outfits - 5 custom backstories - On average, studier and more immune to disease than humans, but really dislike cold climates.
